snippet.title: Touchdown Football for the Atari 8-bit family
snippet.description:
Came also out for:

Atari 7800
Commodore 64
PC Booter 


Game description:

Touchdown Football is an American football game for 1 - 2 players. The computer can also play against itself, and you can just sit back, relax, and watch.

Call the plays, then run them using the keyboard or joystick. 


What I think:

It is rather slow and has a REALLY bad scrolling (imho), but fun can be found in this game...but only for hardcore American football fans. It is by no means a bad game, but it just isn't a good one either. It is, simply put, meh.

I let the computer play against itself, because I thought it is more exciting. XD
